resources.string: Type new password. Yes, you do not need your old password because the storage is already decrypted.
VolManager does not like this password
VolManager does not give us encryption state
Looks like disk encryption is not turned on!
Error while changing password! Please change password manually in device settings!!!
Password changed OK! Now you can use this password for decrypting device after boot
This app allows users of Android 4.0+ to set device encryption password different from screen unlock password
